akn:section.akn:heading: Development and implementation of a civil justice expense and delay reduction plan

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The civil justice expense and delay reduction plan implemented by a district court shall be developed or selected, as the case may be, after consideration of the recommendations of an advisory group appointed in accordance with section 478 of this title.
